EmailTemplate.name: Email Project.Ground Support Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: Ground Support Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Ground Support Inquiry
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
We’re glad to hear from you!
We started working on your {!Case.Subject} inquiry and encountered a hurdle. Our Ground Support Solutions group only sells and supports Honeywell designed: 1 Assembly/disassembly tooling
2 Test fixtures 3 Diagnostic test equipment
Unfortunately, the part you requested does not appear to be in our product line. If we are mistaken, please reply to this email – keeping the subject line unchanged. We’re sorry we couldn’t process your request.
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
